CustomField.description: StarTrack No Data Consignment field will be used to flag case record if Receiver Suburb and Receiver Postcode is blank.
CustomField.formula: IF(AND(ISBLANK( ArticleTest__r.ReceiverPostcode__c ), ISBLANK( ArticleTest__r.Receiver_Suburb__c )), true, false)
CustomField.label: No Data Consignment
